title: May the Brave Firefighter
backCoverBlurb: May wants to be a firefighter when he grows up! He loves fire trucks and helping people. Join Firefighter May as he saves the day.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He often looks surprised or excited. He is wearing a yellow firefighter jacket and a red helmet.

pages.text: May put on his shiny red helmet. I am Firefighter May! he said.
pages.imagePrompt: May with curly blonde hair and blue eyes wearing a large red firefighter helmet.

pages.text: He jumped into his big, bright red fire truck. Wee-woo!
pages.imagePrompt: May sitting inside a toy-like red fire truck with flashing lights.

pages.text: The fire truck zoomed down the street to help people.
pages.imagePrompt: A red fire truck driving fast on a sunny road.

pages.text: Oh no! A little puppy was stuck on a high roof.
pages.imagePrompt: A small brown puppy sitting nervously on a rooftop.

pages.text: Firefighter May is here! Don't be scared, puppy.
pages.imagePrompt: May looking up at the puppy with a determined face.

pages.text: He climbed up the long, silver ladder very carefully.
pages.imagePrompt: May climbing a ladder, looking brave and focused.

pages.text: He grabbed the puppy and held it close to his chest.
pages.imagePrompt: May hugging the puppy while sitting on the ladder.

pages.text: Everyone on the street cheered for Firefighter May. Yay!
pages.imagePrompt: A group of people clapping and smiling below.

pages.text: May felt very proud to be a helper in his town.
pages.imagePrompt: May with a big, joyful smile and bright blue eyes.

pages.text: Being a firefighter is a big and important job.
pages.imagePrompt: May standing next to his fire truck, looking strong.

pages.text: It was time to go back to the station for a rest.
pages.imagePrompt: The fire station with large red doors in the evening.

pages.text: Goodnight, Firefighter May. You are a real hero!
pages.imagePrompt: May sleeping in his bed with his red helmet nearby.
